label: SearchDocumentsResult
description: Response containing search results from an index.

fields.label: Count
fields.tooltip: Total count of results found by the search operation, or null if not requested.

fields.label: Next Link
fields.tooltip: Continuation URL returned when the query cannot return all requested documents in a single response.

fields.label: Coverage
fields.tooltip: Percentage of the index that was included in the query.

fields.label: Facets
fields.tooltip: Facet results organized as buckets for each faceted field. Use Edit JSON to inspect.

fields.label: Next Page Parameters
fields.tooltip: Continuation JSON payload for issuing another Search request.

fields.label: Debug
fields.tooltip: Debug information that applies to the search results as a whole.

fields.label: Semantic Partial Response Reason
fields.tooltip: Reason that a partial response was returned for a semantic ranking request.

fields.label: Semantic Partial Response Type
fields.tooltip: Type of partial response returned for a semantic ranking request.

fields.label: Semantic Query Rewrites Result Type
fields.tooltip: Type of query rewrite that was used to retrieve documents.
